id: Turkey searches Saudi consul general's residence
paragraph:
Investigators were given permission to search for Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi's body weeks after the murder.Jamal Khashoggi's body has still not been found more than three weeks after he was killed in the Saudi consulate in Istanbul, but the investigation is ongoing.Meanwhile, US President Donald Trump has piled on the pressure on Saudi Arabia, calling it the worst cover-up in the history of cover-ups and saying ultimate responsibility could lie with Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman. Al Jazeera's Alan Fisher reports from Istanbul.The Philippines’ Typhoon Haiyan was the strongest storm ever to make landfall. Five years on, we revisit this story.

Russian-Saudi relations could be very different today, if Stalin hadn't killed the Soviet ambassador to Saudi Arabia.From Qatar to Alaska, a personal journey exploring what it means to belong when your culture is endangered.
